quest.name: Charmless Man
journal:
î‚¾ Quest Sync
Sveinn has discovered something unusual in the delivery brought from the mine.
objectives: Show the cat's-eye charm to the graveyard keeper.
Give the cat's-eye charm to the one-eyed miner.

dialogue.name: SVEINN
dialogue.text: Have you seen a charm like this before? I found it among the stones brought from the mine. A lot of the workers wear these for good luck, and I expect whoever lost it is wondering where it went.

dialogue.name: SVEINN
dialogue.text: It's the first time I've seen one made from cat's-eye, so the owner shouldn't be hard to track down. I'd go and look for them myself, but I've got too much to do here.

dialogue.name: SVEINN
dialogue.text: Would you be able to go in my place? The graveyard keeper is quite knowledgeable about charms and whatnot, so it might be worth asking him.

dialogue.name: SVEINN
dialogue.text: I can't very well keep it for myself or sell it. For all I know, it could be cursed or something!

dialogue.name: PRIEST03511
dialogue.text: Oh, yes. Cat's-eye charms like this were once used to ward off misfortune. The tradition began with the Church of the First Light and the gem represents their patron deity.

dialogue.name: PRIEST03511
dialogue.text: Even though no one follows that old religion anymore, some of its customs remain, especially among the miners.

dialogue.name: PRIEST03511
dialogue.text: You don't see many this exquisite, though. I seem to remember the fellow with an eyepatch kept a similar charm around his neck. It might even be the exact same one.

dialogue.name: PRIEST03511
dialogue.text: I never caught his name, but he's not hard to miss. The last I saw of him, he was leaving to mine Nuvy's Leavings with some of the others.

dialogue.name: SVEINN
dialogue.text: Man with an eyepatch? Yes, I know the one. So you think the charm might be his?

dialogue.name: PRIEST03511
dialogue.text: I can't say for certain if the man I mentioned is the owner. I have a feeling I saw him wearing that charm, though.

dialogue.name: MINER03511
dialogue.text: Oh, I didn't notice you there. What do you want?

dialogue.name: MINER03511
dialogue.text: Gods! How could I have been so careless!

dialogue.name: MINER03511
dialogue.text: This was all my sister left behind before she... Look, I'd rather not talk about it. But I appreciate you bringing this back to me. It means a lot.
